name: homerun bun
description:
homerun bun is a game of high-velocity keep-up. Test your skill and see how long you can last!

⸺⸺⸺⸺[ CONTROLS ]⸺⸺⸺⸺

Movement: arrow keys  ||  Left stick | D-pad

Jump: Up  ||  A

Swing: Z | Space  ||  X | B | Triggers

Shop: Enter  ||  Select

Pause: Escape  ||  Start

Fullscreen: F

Delete progress: Ctrl+Shift+Delete

Note: Turn off the Ball Trail in the pause menu if you are experiencing FPS drops.
